title: Automated Test Execution Framework
iWant: to execute comprehensive automated tests across multiple environments
soThat: I can ensure code quality and catch defects before production deployment

acceptanceTests.title: Test Suite Execution
acceptanceTests.description: Given a test suite is configured, when I trigger execution, then all tests run within 10 minutes and generate detailed reports

acceptanceTests.title: Multi-Environment Support
acceptanceTests.description: Given tests are ready, when I select target environments, then tests execute on dev, staging, and production environments with environment-specific configurations

acceptanceTests.title: Failure Detection and Reporting
acceptanceTests.description: Given tests are running, when a test fails, then the system captures screenshots, logs, and stack traces and sends notifications to the team

acceptanceTests.title: Test Result Dashboard
acceptanceTests.description: Given tests have completed, when I view the dashboard, then I see pass/fail rates, execution times, and trend analysis over the last 30 days
